Regulatory Build¶

Compute regulatory features based on peak calling and segmentation input. The script was written in a time when epigenomes where cell types.

Compute celltype-specific transcription factor binding sites¶

Methods¶

compute_celltype_tf_sites¶

Directories created:

  • working_dir/celltype_tf

  • working_dir/celltype_dnase

Iterates through each cell type defined in $options->{cell_type_tfs} (see get_metadata) and calls compute_celltype_tf_sites_2.

compute_celltype_tf_sites_2¶

Ensembl Regulation
